verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥חַ <S%H5329><s%> To the chief Musician עַֽל־ <S%H5921><s%> upon הַשְּׁמִינִ֗ית <S%H8067><s%> upon Sheminith מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> A Psalm לְדָוִֽד׃ <S%H1732><s%> of David הוֹשִׁ֣יעָה <S%H3467><s%> Help יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> LORD כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for גָמַ֣ר <S%H1584><s%> ceaseth חָסִ֑יד <S%H2623><s%> for the godly man כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> for פַ֥סּוּ <S%H6461><s%> fail אֱ֝מוּנִ֗ים <S%H539><s%> for the faithful מִבְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> from among the children אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men

שָׁ֤וְא ׀ <S%H7723><s%> vanity יְֽדַבְּרוּ֮ <S%H1696><s%> They speak אִ֤ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every one אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for רֵ֫עֵ֥הוּ <S%H7453><s%> with his neighbour שְׂפַ֥ת <S%H8193><s%> lips חֲלָק֑וֹת <S%H2513><s%> [with] flattering בְּלֵ֖ב <S%H3820><s%> [and] with a double וָלֵ֣ב <S%H3820><s%> heart יְדַבֵּֽרוּ׃ <S%H1696><s%> do they speak

יַכְרֵ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> shall cut off יְ֭הוָה <S%H3068><s%> The LORD כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all שִׂפְתֵ֣י <S%H8193><s%> lips חֲלָק֑וֹת <S%H2513><s%> all flattering לָ֝שׁ֗וֹן <S%H3956><s%> [and] the tongue מְדַבֶּ֥רֶת <S%H1696><s%> that speaketh גְּדֹלֽוֹת׃ <S%H1419><s%> proud

אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> Who אָֽמְר֨וּ ׀ <S%H559><s%> Who have said לִלְשֹׁנֵ֣נוּ <S%H3956><s%> With our tongue נַ֭גְבִּיר <S%H1396><s%> will we prevail שְׂפָתֵ֣ינוּ <S%H8193><s%> our lips אִתָּ֑נוּ <S%H853><s%> מִ֖י <S%H4310><s%> who אָד֣וֹן <S%H113><s%> [are] our own who [is] lord לָֽנוּ׃

מִשֹּׁ֥ד <S%H7701><s%> For the oppression עֲנִיִּים֮ <S%H6041><s%> of the poor מֵאַנְקַ֪ת <S%H603><s%> for the sighing אֶבְי֫וֹנִ֥ים <S%H34><s%> of the needy עַתָּ֣ה <S%H6258><s%> Now אָ֭קוּם <S%H6965><s%> now will I arise יֹאמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> saith יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אָשִׁ֥ית <S%H7896><s%> I will set בְּ֝יֵ֗שַׁע <S%H3468><s%> [him] in safety יָפִ֥יחַֽ <S%H6315><s%> [from him that] puffeth לֽוֹ׃

אִֽמֲר֣וֹת <S%H565><s%> The words יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֲמָר֪וֹת <S%H565><s%> words טְהֹ֫ר֥וֹת <S%H2889><s%> [are] pure כֶּ֣סֶף <S%H3701><s%> [as] silver צָ֭רוּף <S%H6884><s%> tried בַּעֲלִ֣יל <S%H5948><s%> in a furnace לָאָ֑רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of earth מְ֝זֻקָּ֗ק <S%H2212><s%> purified שִׁבְעָתָֽיִם׃ <S%H7659><s%> seven times

אַתָּֽה־ <S%H859><s%> O יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> them O LORD תִּשְׁמְרֵ֑ם <S%H8104><s%> Thou shalt keep תִּצְּרֶ֓נּוּ ׀ <S%H5341><s%> thou shalt preserve מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at הַדּ֖וֹר <S%H1755><s%> generation ז֣וּ <S%H2098><s%> them from this לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> for ever

סָבִ֗יב <S%H5439><s%> on every side רְשָׁעִ֥ים <S%H7563><s%> The wicked יִתְהַלָּכ֑וּן <S%H1980><s%> walk כְּרֻ֥ם <S%H7311><s%> are exalted זֻ֝לּ֗וּת <S%H2149><s%> when the vilest לִבְנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> the sons אָדָֽם׃ <S%H120><s%> of men
